# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸªŸ Tmux Configuration - Catppuccin Mocha Theme
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# ğŸ”§ Basic Settings
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Increase scrollback buffer size
set -g history-limit 50000

# Enable focus events
set -g focus-events on

# Super useful when using "grouped sessions" and multi-monitor setup
set-window-option -g aggressive-resize on

# Set default shell
set-option -g default-shell /usr/bin/zsh
set-option -g default-command /usr/bin/zsh

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ¨ Colors (Catppuccin Mocha)
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

set -g default-terminal "tmux-256color"
set -ga terminal-overrides ",*256col*:Tc"
set -ga terminal-overrides '*:Ss=\E[%p1%dTc:Se=\E[2Tc'

# Catppuccin Mocha Color Palette
set -g @catppuccin_flavour 'mocha'

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# âŒ¨ï¸ Keybindings
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Set prefix to Ctrl-a (like GNU screen)
unbind C-b
set-option -g prefix C-a
bind-key C-a send-prefix

# Reload configuration
bind r source-file ~/.tmux.conf \; display "Config reloaded!"

# Split panes using | and -
bind | split-window -h -c "#{pane_current_path}"
bind - split-window -v -c "#{pane_current_path}"
unbind '"'
unbind %

# Create new window in current path
bind c new-window -c "#{pane_current_path}"

# Navigate panes using vim-like keys
bind h select-pane -L
bind j select-pane -D
bind k select-pane -U
bind l select-pane -R

# Navigate windows
bind -r C-h previous-window
bind -r C-l next-window

# Resize panes
bind -r H resize-pane -L 5
bind -r J resize-pane -D 5
bind -r K resize-pane -U 5
bind -r L resize-pane -R 5

# Copy mode vi-style
setw -g mode-keys vi
bind -T copy-mode-vi v send -X begin-selection
bind -T copy-mode-vi y send-keys -X copy-pipe-and-cancel "xclip -in -selection clipboard"
bind P paste-buffer

# Mouse support
set -g mouse on

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ“Š Status Bar (TOP position)
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Position status bar at top
set-option -g status-position top

# Status bar update interval
set -g status-interval 1

# Longer status line
set -g status-left-length 100
set -g status-right-length 100

# Status bar style
set -g status-style "bg=#1e1e2e,fg=#cdd6f4"

# Left status: session name
set -g status-left "#[bg=#cba6f7,fg=#1e1e2e,bold] #S #[bg=#45475a,fg=#cba6f7]#{?window_zoomed_flag,ğŸ” ,} "

# Right status: git, cpu, date, time
set -g status-right "#{E:@catppuccin_status_git}#[bg=#45475a,fg=#a6e3a1] #{cpu_icon} #{cpu_percentage} #[bg=#45475a,fg=#89b4fa]%Y-%m-%d #[bg=#89b4fa,fg=#1e1e2e,bold]%H:%M:%S "

# Window status
set -g window-status-format "#[bg=#45475a,fg=#cdd6f4] #I:#W "
set -g window-status-current-format "#[bg=#cba6f7,fg=#1e1e2e,bold] #I:#W* "
set -g window-status-separator ""

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸªŸ Window & Pane Settings
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Start window and pane numbering at 1
set -g base-index 1
setw -g pane-base-index 1

# Renumber windows when one is closed
set -g renumber-windows on

# Automatically rename windows
setw -g automatic-rename on

# Don't rename window automatically when running commands
setw -g allow-rename off

# Pane borders
set -g pane-border-style "fg=#45475a"
set -g pane-active-border-style "fg=#cba6f7"

# Pane indicator colors
set -g display-panes-colour "#45475a"
set -g display-panes-active-colour "#cba6f7"

# ğŸªŸ Tmux Configuration - Catppuccin Mocha Theme
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ”§ Basic Settings
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Increase scrollback buffer size
set -g history-limit 50000

# Enable focus events
set -g focus-events on

# Super useful when using "grouped sessions" and multi-monitor setup
set-window-option -g aggressive-resize on

# Set default shell
set-option -g default-shell /usr/bin/zsh
set-option -g default-command /usr/bin/zsh

# Enable true color
set -g default-terminal "tmux-256color"
set -ga terminal-overrides ",*256col*:Tc"
set -ga terminal-overrides '*:Ss=\E[%p1%dTc:Se=\E[2Tc'

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# âŒ¨ï¸ Keybindings
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Set prefix to Ctrl-a (like GNU screen)
unbind C-b
set-option -g prefix C-a
bind-key C-a send-prefix

# Reload configuration
bind r source-file ~/.tmux.conf \; display "Config reloaded!"

# Split panes using | and -
bind | split-window -h -c "#{pane_current_path}"
bind - split-window -v -c "#{pane_current_path}"
unbind '"'
unbind %

# Create new window in current path
bind c new-window -c "#{pane_current_path}"

# Navigate panes using vim-like keys
bind h select-pane -L
bind j select-pane -D
bind k select-pane -U
bind l select-pane -R

# Navigate windows
bind -r C-h previous-window
bind -r C-l next-window

# Resize panes
bind -r H resize-pane -L 5
bind -r J resize-pane -D 5
bind -r K resize-pane -U 5
bind -r L resize-pane -R 5

# Copy mode vi-style
setw -g mode-keys vi
bind -T copy-mode-vi v send -X begin-selection
bind -T copy-mode-vi y send-keys -X copy-pipe-and-cancel "xclip -in -selection clipboard"
bind P paste-buffer

# Mouse support
set -g mouse on

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸªŸ Window & Pane Settings
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Start window and pane numbering at 1
set -g base-index 1
setw -g pane-base-index 1

# Renumber windows when one is closed
set -g renumber-windows on

# Automatically rename windows
setw -g automatic-rename on

# Don't rename window automatically when running commands
setw -g allow-rename off

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Catppuccin flavour

set -g status-position top

set -g status-left-length 100
set -g status-right-length 100

set -g @catppuccin_status_left "#{?client_prefix,#[fg=#cba6f7]#[bg=#1e1e2e],#[fg=#1e1e2e]#[bg=#cba6f7]}#[bold] #S #[bg=#45475a]#{?window_zoomed_flag,ğŸ” ,}"

# Catppuccin status bar right

set -g @catppuccin_window_status_current_format "#[bg=#cba6f7,fg=#1e1e2e,bold] #I:#W* "

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸªŸ Tmux Configuration - Catppuccin Mocha Theme
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ”§ Basic Settings
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Increase scrollback buffer size
set -g history-limit 50000

# Enable focus events
set -g focus-events on

# Super useful when using "grouped sessions" and multi-monitor setup
set-window-option -g aggressive-resize on

# Set default shell
set-option -g default-shell /usr/bin/zsh
set-option -g default-command /usr/bin/zsh

# Enable true color
set -g default-terminal "tmux-256color"
set -ga terminal-overrides ",*256col*:Tc"
set -ga terminal-overrides '*:Ss=\E[%p1%dTc:Se=\E[2Tc'

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# âŒ¨ï¸ Keybindings
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Set prefix to Ctrl-a (like GNU screen)
unbind C-b
set-option -g prefix C-a
bind-key C-a send-prefix

# Reload configuration
bind r source-file ~/.tmux.conf \; display "Config reloaded!"

# Split panes using | and -
bind | split-window -h -c "#{pane_current_path}"
bind - split-window -v -c "#{pane_current_path}"
unbind '"'
unbind %

# Create new window in current path
bind c new-window -c "#{pane_current_path}"

# Navigate panes using vim-like keys
bind h select-pane -L
bind j select-pane -D
bind k select-pane -U
bind l select-pane -R

# Navigate windows
bind -r C-h previous-window
bind -r C-l next-window

# Resize panes
bind -r H resize-pane -L 5
bind -r J resize-pane -D 5
bind -r K resize-pane -U 5
bind -r L resize-pane -R 5

# Copy mode vi-style
setw -g mode-keys vi
bind -T copy-mode-vi v send -X begin-selection
bind -T copy-mode-vi y send-keys -X copy-pipe-and-cancel "xclip -in -selection clipboard"
bind P paste-buffer

# Mouse support
set -g mouse on

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸªŸ Window & Pane Settings
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Start window and pane numbering at 1
set -g base-index 1
setw -g pane-base-index 1

# Renumber windows when one is closed
set -g renumber-windows on

# Automatically rename windows
setw -g automatic-rename on

# Don't rename window automatically when running commands
setw -g allow-rename off

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ¨ Catppuccin Theme Settings
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Catppuccin flavour
set -g @catppuccin_flavour 'mocha'

# Status bar position (top)
set -g status-position top

# Status bar configuration
set -g status-left-length 100
set -g status-right-length 100

# Catppuccin status bar left
set -g @catppuccin_status_left "#{?client_prefix,#[fg=#cba6f7]#[bg=#1e1e2e],#[fg=#1e1e2e]#[bg=#cba6f7]}#[bold] #S #[bg=#45475a]#{?window_zoomed_flag,ğŸ” ,}"

# Catppuccin status bar right
set -g @catppuccin_status_right "#{E:@catppuccin_status_git}#[bg=#45475a,fg=#a6e3a1] #{cpu_icon} #{cpu_percentage} #[bg=#45475a,fg=#89b4fa]%Y-%m-%d #[bg=#89b4fa,fg=#1e1e2e,bold]%H:%M:%S "

# Catppuccin window status
set -g @catppuccin_window_status_format "#[bg=#45475a,fg=#cdd6f4] #I:#W "
set -g @catppuccin_window_status_current_format "#[bg=#cba6f7,fg=#1e1e2e,bold] #I:#W* "

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ”Œ TPM (Tmux Plugin Manager)
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# List of plugins
set -g @plugin 'tmux-plugins/tpm'                # TPM itself
set -g @plugin 'tmux-plugins/tmux-sensible'       # Sensible settings
set -g @plugin 'catppuccin/tmux'                 # Catppuccin theme
set -g @plugin 'tmux-plugins/tmux-resurrect'     # Save/restore sessions
set -g @plugin 'tmux-plugins/tmux-continuum'      # Auto-save/restore
set -g @plugin 'tmux-plugins/tmux-yank'           # Copy to system clipboard
set -g @plugin 'tmux-plugins/tmux-fzf'            # Fzf integration
set -g @plugin 'tmux-plugins/tmux-cpu'            # CPU usage
set -g @plugin 'laktak/tmux-jump'                 # Jump to text

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ¯ Plugin Settings
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# tmux-resurrect settings
set -g @resurrect-capture-pane-contents 'on'
set -g @resurrect-strategy-nvim 'session'
set -g @resurrect-save-shell-history 'on'

# tmux-continuum settings
set -g @continuum-restore 'on'
set -g @continuum-save-interval '15'
set -g @continuum-boot 'on'
set -g @continuum-boot-options 'iterm'

# tmux-yank settings
set -g @yank_selection_mouse 'clipboard'
set -g @yank_action 'copy-pipe-no-clear'

# tmux-jump settings
set -g @jump-key 's'

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸš€ Initialize TPM
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Run TPM (keep this line at the very bottom)
run '~/.tmux/plugins/tpm/tpm'

lines: -# Right status: git, cpu, date, time
# Don't rename window automatically when running commands

# Increase scrollback buffer size
set -g history-limit 50000

# Enable focus events
set -g focus-events on

# Super useful when using "grouped sessions" and multi-monitor setup
set-window-option -g aggressive-resize on

# Set default shell
set-option -g default-shell /usr/bin/zsh
set-option -g default-command /usr/bin/zsh

# Enable true color
set -g default-terminal "tmux-256color"
set -ga terminal-overrides ",*256col*:Tc"
set -ga terminal-overrides '*:Ss=\E[%p1%dTc:Se=\E[2Tc'

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Set prefix to Ctrl-a (like GNU screen)
unbind C-b
set-option -g prefix C-a
bind-key C-a send-prefix

bind r source-file ~/.tmux.conf \; display "Config reloaded!"

# Split panes using | and -
bind | split-window -h -c "#{pane_current_path}"
bind - split-window -v -c "#{pane_current_path}"
unbind '"'
unbind %

# Create new window in current path
bind c new-window -c "#{pane_current_path}"

# Navigate panes using vim-like keys
bind h select-pane -L
bind j select-pane -D
bind k select-pane -U
bind l select-pane -R

# Navigate windows
bind -r C-h previous-window
bind -r C-l next-window

# Resize panes
bind -r H resize-pane -L 5
bind -r J resize-pane -D 5
bind -r K resize-pane -U 5
bind -r L resize-pane -R 5

# Copy mode vi-style
setw -g mode-keys vi
bind -T copy-mode-vi v send -X begin-selection
bind -T copy-mode-vi y send-keys -X copy-pipe-and-cancel "xclip -in -selection clipboard"
bind P paste-buffer

# Mouse support

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸªŸ Tmux Configuration - Catppuccin Mocha Theme
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ”§ Basic Settings
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Increase scrollback buffer size
set -g history-limit 50000

# Enable focus events
set -g focus-events on

# Super useful when using "grouped sessions" and multi-monitor setup
set-window-option -g aggressive-resize on

# Set default shell
set-option -g default-shell /usr/bin/zsh
set-option -g default-command /usr/bin/zsh

# Enable true color
set -g default-terminal "tmux-256color"
set -ga terminal-overrides ",*256col*:Tc"
set -ga terminal-overrides '*:Ss=\E[%p1%dTc:Se=\E[2Tc'

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# âŒ¨ï¸ Keybindings
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Set prefix to Ctrl-a (like GNU screen)
unbind C-b
set-option -g prefix C-a
bind-key C-a send-prefix

# Reload configuration
bind r source-file ~/.tmux.conf \; display "Config reloaded!"

# Split panes using | and -
bind | split-window -h -c "#{pane_current_path}"
bind - split-window -v -c "#{pane_current_path}"
unbind '"'
unbind %

# Create new window in current path
bind c new-window -c "#{pane_current_path}"

# Navigate panes using vim-like keys
bind h select-pane -L
bind j select-pane -D
bind k select-pane -U
bind l select-pane -R

# Navigate windows
bind -r C-h previous-window
bind -r C-l next-window

# Resize panes
bind -r H resize-pane -L 5
bind -r J resize-pane -D 5
bind -r K resize-pane -U 5
bind -r L resize-pane -R 5

# Copy mode vi-style
setw -g mode-keys vi
bind -T copy-mode-vi v send -X begin-selection
bind -T copy-mode-vi y send-keys -X copy-pipe-and-cancel "xclip -in -selection clipboard"
bind P paste-buffer

# Mouse support
set -g mouse on

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸªŸ Window & Pane Settings
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Start window and pane numbering at 1
set -g base-index 1
setw -g pane-base-index 1

# Renumber windows when one is closed
set -g renumber-windows on

# Automatically rename windows
setw -g automatic-rename on

# Don't rename window automatically when running commands
setw -g allow-rename off

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ¨ Catppuccin Theme Settings
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Catppuccin flavour
set -g @catppuccin_flavour 'mocha'

# Status bar position (top)
set -g status-position top

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ”Œ TPM (Tmux Plugin Manager)
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# List of plugins
set -g @plugin 'tmux-plugins/tpm'
set -g @plugin 'tmux-plugins/tmux-sensible'
set -g @plugin 'catppuccin/tmux'
set -g @plugin 'tmux-plugins/tmux-resurrect'
set -g @plugin 'tmux-plugins/tmux-continuum'
set -g @plugin 'tmux-plugins/tmux-yank'
set -g @plugin 'tmux-plugins/tmux-cpu'

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ¯ Plugin Settings
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# tmux-resurrect settings
set -g @resurrect-capture-pane-contents 'on'
set -g @resurrect-strategy-nvim 'session'
set -g @resurrect-save-shell-history 'on'

# tmux-continuum settings
set -g @continuum-restore 'on'
set -g @continuum-save-interval '15'
set -g @continuum-boot 'on'
set -g @continuum-boot-options 'iterm'

# tmux-yank settings
set -g @yank_selection_mouse 'clipboard'
set -g @yank_action 'copy-pipe-no-clear'

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ¨ Catppuccin Theme Settings
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Catppuccin flavour
set -g @catppuccin_flavour 'mocha'

# Status bar position (top)
set -g status-position top

# Status bar configuration
set -g status-left-length 100
set -g status-right-length 100

# Catppuccin status bar left
set -g @catppuccin_status_left "#{?client_prefix,#[fg=#cba6f7]#[bg=#1e1e2e],#[fg=#1e1e2e]#[bg=#cba6f7]}#[bold] #S #[bg=#45475a]#{?window_zoomed_flag,ğŸ” ,}"

# Catppuccin status bar right
set -g @catppuccin_status_right "#{E:@catppuccin_status_git}#[bg=#45475a,fg=#a6e3a1] #{cpu_icon} #{cpu_percentage} #[bg=#45475a,fg=#89b4fa]%Y-%m-%d #[bg=#89b4fa,fg=#1e1e2e,bold]%H:%M:%S "

# Catppuccin window status
set -g @catppuccin_window_status_format "#[bg=#45475a,fg=#cdd6f4] #I:#W "
set -g @catppuccin_window_status_current_format "#[bg=#cba6f7,fg=#1e1e2e,bold] #I:#W* "

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ”Œ TPM (Tmux Plugin Manager)
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# List of plugins
set -g @plugin 'tmux-plugins/tpm'                # TPM itself
set -g @plugin 'tmux-plugins/tmux-sensible'       # Sensible settings
set -g @plugin 'catppuccin/tmux'                 # Catppuccin theme
set -g @plugin 'tmux-plugins/tmux-resurrect'     # Save/restore sessions
set -g @plugin 'tmux-plugins/tmux-continuum'      # Auto-save/restore
set -g @plugin 'tmux-plugins/tmux-yank'           # Copy to system clipboard
set -g @plugin 'tmux-plugins/tmux-fzf'            # Fzf integration
set -g @plugin 'tmux-plugins/tmux-cpu'            # CPU usage
set -g @plugin 'laktak/tmux-jump'                 # Jump to text

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ¯ Plugin Settings
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# tmux-resurrect settings
set -g @resurrect-capture-pane-contents 'on'
set -g @resurrect-strategy-nvim 'session'
set -g @resurrect-save-shell-history 'on'

# tmux-continuum settings
set -g @continuum-restore 'on'
set -g @continuum-save-interval '15'
set -g @continuum-boot 'on'
set -g @continuum-boot-options 'iterm'

# tmux-yank settings
set -g @yank_selection_mouse 'clipboard'
set -g @yank_action 'copy-pipe-no-clear'

# tmux-jump settings
set -g @jump-key 's'

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸš€ Initialize TPM
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Run TPM (keep this line at the very bottom)
run '~/.tmux/plugins/tpm/tpm'
